column1: Smoque BBQ////Both the brisket and the pulled pork were so tender and smokey
column2: they come with sauce on the side. A thinner
column3: less sweet type of sauce. Eh
column5: sweet goopy stuff - but this was still tasty. I'm not a huge fans of beans
column6: but these were fantastic with huge chunks of meat in them. Everybody seems to love the mac & cheese and it does not disappoint. The cornbread
column7: fries and peach cobbler were good
column8: although the cornbread was a little dry.
